title: Strictly Come Dancing: Cheryl makes a surprise show appearance
text:
She's a judge on BBC's other dancing show The Greatest Dancer.

And Cheryl showed her support for Strictly Come Dancing on Saturday night as she made a surprise show appearance.

The Fight for This Love singer, 36, sent show watchers into meltdown as she sat in the audience.

While ahead of the live programme, Cheryl posed for a glamorous photo with Strictly hosts Tess Daly and Claudia Winkleman.

Scroll down for video

Exciting: Cheryl showed her support for Strictly Come Dancing on Saturday night as she made a surprise show appearance (pictured with hosts Tess Daly and Claudia Winkleman)

The mother-of-one, who shares son Bear, two, with ex Liam Payne, looked sensational for the evening as she embraced the Strictly sparkle theme with a gold sequinned blazer.

She teamed the jazzy item of clothing with a pair of black trousers and a high-neck top for a stylish finish.

Cheryl styled her luscious long brunette locks into a glossy blow-dried hairdo, she added a slick of make-up to enhance her pretty features.

Meanwhile Tess wowed in a strapless crushed midnight blue velvet jumpsuit which showcased her toned figure.

Exciting: The Fight for This Love singer, 36, sent show watchers into meltdown as she sat in the audience

The presenter, 50, styled her signature blonde locks into a glossy blow-dried hairdo and she added a slick of glamorous make-up.

While Claudia looked incredible in a sheer black and white dotted chiffon midi dress with flowy sleeves.

The presenter, 47, styled her signature raven locks and fringe into a sweptback hairdo, adding her make-up of choice smokey black eyeliner.

After Cheryl made a surprise appearance in the audience at the start of the show, fans took to Twitter to share their shock at seeing the singer on Strictly.

Stunning: Tess wowed in a strapless crushed midnight blue velvet jumpsuit which showcased her toned figure

Chic: While Claudia looked incredible in a sheer black and white dotted chiffon midi dress with flowy sleeves

One person said: 'Omg Cheryl at Strictly.'

A different user put: 'Pls if Dianne and Cheryl get a photo together at strictly tonight I will forever and always be happy.'

Another show watcher commented: 'Omg Cheryl in the audience! #Strictly.'

While a different account added: 'Cheryl’s at Strictly Come Dancing! Almost screamed when I saw her on the tv! ❤️.'

Meltdown: After Cheryl made a surprise appearance in the audience at the start of the show, fans took to Twitter to share their shock at seeing the singer on Strictly

Judges: Cheryl was a judge on BBC's other dancing show, The Greatest Dancer, earlier this series sitting alongside Glee's Matthew Morrison and Strictly dancer Oti Mabuse on the panel (pictured together in 2018)

Cheryl was a judge on BBC's other dancing show, The Greatest Dancer, earlier this series sitting alongside Glee's Matthew Morrison and Strictly dancer Oti Mabuse on the panel.

The star was no doubt supporting Oti and her celebrity partner Kelvin Fletcher on the dance floor on Saturday night after developing a close friendship on the series.

This isn't Cheryl's first appeared in the Strictly audience and in 2012 she attended the show to applaud her BFF and Girls Aloud bandmate Kimberley Walsh.

Strictly Come Dancing continues on Saturday on BBC One.
description: The Fight for This Love singer, 36, sent show watchers into meltdown as she sat in the audience.
